column1: The consultant can help with positions and offer advice when your baby has trouble sucking.
Women with large breasts or flat nipples also like the football hold.
- Cradle the back of your baby's head in your hand so the baby's nose is pointing at your nipple.
You can use this position when you are lying in bed.
- Lie your baby close to you with the baby's face at your breast.
- Rub a little breast milk on your nipple after feeding to protect it.
